title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While the pasta is cooking, crisp the diced guanciale in a large pan.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta and immediately add it to the pan with the guanciale. Toss well.
Quickly pour the egg mixture over the hot pasta, tossing continuously to create a creamy sauce without scrambling the eggs. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala

ingredients: 2 lb chicken breast, cut into cubes
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 30 minutes.
